name: Vibrance Wrap
description:
This piece is so versatile - you can wear it as a scarf, a shawl, a stole, a wrap - whatever suits your fancy! I used a bamboo ring as the tie - the numerous ways to wear it are almost overwhelming! It is crocheted from a soft acrylic yarn in a vivid grass green. The open-weave design makes this wrap perfect for warm weather when all you need is a light wrap to protect against the AC chill or the cool evening breezes. I added kicky multicolor ladder yarn as fringe - making this piece even more vibrant! This wrap will look just as fantastic with a tee, jeans and boots as with a sexy black dress and heels. Fun and flirty, this piece will keep you going through the summer and into the winter months. Makes a wonderful graduation, birthday or Mother's Day gift!

Content: 100% acrylic, tie ring is bamboo, the fringe is 100% nylon
Measurements: approximately 10 inches wide by 76 inches long; due to the open weave design, this piece has a lot of stretch to it
Care info: I recommend hand washing and laying flat to dry.

This piece is my own design created by me in my smoke-free, pet-free home. It will ship USPS priority mail with delivery confirmation to US address and USPS First Class International to all other countries. See my profile page for more info. 

I accept PayPal - payment is expected at time of purchase. This piece is complete and ready to ship after payment has been received and cleared.

name: Blackberry Wrap
description:
This piece is so versatile - you can wear it as a scarf, a shawl, a stole, a wrap - whatever suits your fancy! I used a bamboo ring as the tie - the numerous ways to wear it are almost overwhelming! It is crocheted from a soft acrylic/wool blend yarn in shades of dark plum to lavender. The open-weave design makes this wrap perfect for warm weather when all you need is a light wrap to protect against the AC chill or the cool evening breezes. A flower brooch is included - you can use it and the bamboo ring together or separately to create different looks. This wrap will look just as fantastic with a tee, jeans and boots as with a sexy black dress and heels. Fun and flirty, this piece will keep you going through the summer and into the winter months. Makes a wonderful gift!

Content: acrylic/wool blend, tie ring is bamboo
Measurements: approximately 12 inches wide by 62 inches long; due to the open weave design, this piece has a lot of stretch to it
Care info: I recommend hand washing and laying flat to dry.

This piece is my own design created by me in my smoke-free, pet-free home. It will ship USPS priority mail with delivery confirmation to US address and USPS First Class International to all other countries. See my profile page for more info. 

I accept PayPal - payment is expected at time of purchase. This piece is complete and ready to ship after payment has been received and cleared.

name: Tea Garden Lariat
description:
This is a made-to-order item. Please allow approximately 1 week to complete and ship after purchase.

Fun, flirty and feminine, this lariat is a must have for your wardrobe. Perfect over pretty much any outfit: a tee and jeans, a jacket, a sweater, even a sweet party dress. Wrap it around and wear it as a necklace or cowl. Loop one end and draw the other ends through to wear as a choker. Leave it long and loose or even wear around your waist as a funky belt. Experiment with different looks and find your favorite.

The lariat is crocheted from a bulky wool/acrylic blend yarn in gorgeous green. Each rose is created from soft acrylic yarn in rose pink and cream. They are securely attached to the lariat. For extra flair, I added textured slubby yarn in varigated shades of green as fringe. They have been left to hang loose and vine-like from the lariat. What a great accessory to jazz up any outfit. Fun to wear and even more fun to give as a gift to someone special. 

Content: Lariat is acrylic and wool blend, roses are acrylic, fringe is a blend of acrylic, wool and polyamide.
Measurements: 82 inches long and the roses measure about 3 inches across. Fringe ranges from 8 to 13 inches in length
Care info: I recommend hand washing in cool water and laying flat to dry. 

This is my own design, created by me in my smoke-free, pet-free home with care and attention to detail.

Payment is expected at time of purchase.

name: Firecracker Bangle Rag Bag
description:
This sweet purse is crocheted from strips of new, clean fabric in shades of red. I used almost 2 yards of fabric to create this bag and tearing the strips was very time consuming but a great stress reliever. :D The strips have been left to fray which only adds to the wonderful texture of this bag. For the lining I used a complimentary fabric also in red. The handles are brass metal rings and for extra appeal, I attached a fabric yo-yo pin with a fabric covered button center. This bag is great for those shopping trips to the mall or the farmer's market. It is sturdy and durable and ever so charming! Would make a perfect Mother's Day gift for that special mom!

Measurements: approximately 10.5 inches wide by 8 inches high (26.5cm x 20cm)
Content: 100% cotton and the handles are metal
Care: I recommend hand washing and laying flat to dry 

This item is my own design, created by me in my pet-free, smoke-free home. This item will ship USPS Priority Mail to US addresses and USPS First Class International to all other addresses. Payment is expected at time of checkout.

name: Natural Blues Flower Lariat
description:
This piece is complete and ready to ship after purchase.

Fun, flirty and feminine, this lariat is a must have for your wardrobe. Perfect over pretty much any outfit: a tee and jeans, a jacket, a sweater, even a sweet party dress. Wrap it around and wear it as a necklace or cowl. Loop one end and draw the other ends through to wear as a choker. Leave it long and loose or even wear around your waist as a funky belt. Experiment with different looks and find your favorite.

Content: wool/soy blend
Measurements: approximately 90 inches long 
Care info: I recommend hand washing in cool water and laying flat to dry. Do NOT wash in hot water as it will cause the lariat to shrink! 

This item is made by me in my smoke-free, pet-free home. Pattern is designed by Lisa Gentry and used with permission.

Payment is expected at time of purchase.
